Name: Chaotic Eruption
Story Background: In a moment of chaos and fury, the very land itself rises up in rebellion.
Ability: Destroy target land. For each land destroyed this way, its controller may discard a card. If they don't, create a 3/3 Elemental token.
Appearance Description: The artwork shows a fiery volcano erupting, spewing molten lava which engulfs a landscape of shattered earth and burning trees. The sky is filled with dark clouds and lightning strikes, emphasizing the destructive power of the spell.
